name: Prototype Surfer
description:
Description:

Created this game as a challenge, it took one afternoon. I'm planning to make different versions of this to see my development upgrade. You need to avoid the blocks that came of front of you and the tiles that fall. If you take a block or if you fall, you are dead.

That's the first WebGL Unity game I'm making and release, if you find bug or something, feel free to comment I will fix them! I need to tweak my debugging skills! 

Keys:

Left Arrow / Right Arrow Move your character

Space Start the game

Left Mouse Click Restart the game if you are dead

Assets used:

POLYGON Prototype - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty
